metadata.name: Battlefield #1
metadata.description: Run your own free and paid tournaments, custom story games, coop, PvP, huge multiplayer games, the choice is yours. As Conquest continues to evolve, Battlefield NFT holders will be able to customize their battlefield, setting bonus areas, adding geographical features, and even special loot drops! Battlefield NFT holders setup item and magic shops and earn credits as their battlefield is used in game! Give your other NFTs a mission in life to act as guards and AI monsters, with LootShop weapons and powerful Superpass Genesis artifacts. The more your Battlefield is used, the faster it levels up and unlocks even more customizations!
